solicita un apoyo economico para la compra de insumos para elaborar sus alimentos.
texts.en:
Ana is a single woman, 37 years old, the mother of four children, ages 8, 10, 13, and 15, hard-working and very humble. She works making food, a business that she began a little while ago and on which her little ones depend. With this, she managed to get out of an economic crisis which she experienced after separating from her husband, who was the one who supported the household. 

She asks for a loan to purchase supplies to make her dishes.

loans.use: to purchase supplies to make her dishes.

loans.name: Manolita

texts.en:
Manolita is 64 years old and married.

Manolita is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 8,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed, vitamins, and other supplies to raise her livestock.

Manolita has been in this business for two years now, and has borrowed five times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Manolita would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed, vitamins, and other supplies to raise her livestock.

loans.name: Román

texts.es:
Roman, de 45 años de edad, estudio hasta noveno grado, actualmente está divorciado, tienen 2 hijos que están estudiando en la escuela, con Roman también vive su madre, la cual ayuda en labores domésticos en su vivienda.

Roman, se dedica al cultivo de granos básicos como maíz y frijol, estas actividades las realiza desde hace muchos años y su padre fue quien le enseño, ya que desde muy pequeño ayudaba en dichas labores junto a sus hermanos.- Ahora además de sus labores agrícolas recibe un salario como motorista de camión de carga, porque realiza viajes fuera del país dos veces al mes y este es un ingreso que sirve para sus gastos familiares.

El presente crédito lo necesita para comprar insumos agrícolas como fertilizantes, abono, pago de jornales y preparación de terreno para dicho cultivo, con el cual espera tener una buena cosecha este año.

Roman, sueña con tener una vivienda digna, cómoda y segura para su familia, además de poder darle una buena educación a su hijo.
texts.en:
Roman, 45 years old, went to school up to the ninth grade, currently is divorced, and has 2 children who are both at school. Roman's mother also lives with him, who helps with the domestic tasks in the house.

Roman works growing basic grains such as corn and beans. He has done this work for many years and his father taught it to him because, since he was very young, he helped in these tasks with his siblings. Now, in addition to the agricultural work, he gets a salary as a side-loader truck driver because he makes trips out of the country twice a month and this is the income that serves for his family expenses.

The current loan is needed to purchase agricultural supplies such as fertilizers, manure, to pay day laborers and to prepare the land for this crop, which he hopes to have a good harvest this year.  

Roman dreams of having a dignified house, comfortable and secure for his family, in addition to being able to provide his child with a good education.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural supplies such as fertilizers, manure, to pay day laborers and prepare the land for this crop.

loans.name: Cecilia

texts.es: Cecilia tiene 39 años, es casada, tiene 2 hijos y vive en la ciudad de México. Cecilia es una mujer muy curiosa y dedicada, es una apasionada de las manualidades y artesanías, desde siempre ella ha tenido por pasatiempo el hacer manualidades y fue así como inició ofreciendo los trabajos que hacía a sus amigas y posteriormente a más personas. Hace 6 años inició formalmente la venta de manualidades y ofrece todo tipo de artesanía, recuerdo o curiosidad que se pueda imaginar. Su principal obstáculo para hacer crecer su negocio, es la falta de capital para poder invertir en materia prima. Con un préstamo de MXN 10,000 Cecilia podrá comprar materia prima para poder hacer más manualidades y tener más oferta de modelos y artesanías. La principal motivación de Cecilia son sus hijos, considera que su emprendimiento ha sido exitoso porque es una mujer constante y su mayor sueño es ser microempresaria. Ella agradece mucho a todas las personas que aportan con el préstamo que necesita y que la acercan cada vez más a su sueño.
texts.en: Cecilia is 39 years old, married, has 2 children, and lives in Mexico City. Cecilia is a very curious and dedicated woman, who is passionate about arts and crafts. She has always has crafts as a hobby and it was in this way that she began to offer work that she made to her friends and later to more people. Six years ago, she began to formally sell crafts. She sells all sorts of crafts, souvenirs, or curiosities that one can imagine. Her primary obstacle to making her business grow is the lack of capital to be able to invest in raw materials. With a loan of MXN 10,000, Cecilia will be able to purchase raw materials to be able to make more crafts and to have more models and items for sale. Cecilia's primary motivation is her children. She feels her entrepreneurship has been successful because she is a tenacious woman and her greatest dream is to be a micro-business owner. She is very grateful to all the people who contribute to the loan that she needs and that help her get closer and closer to her dream.

loans.use: to purchase raw materials in large quantities.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies for sowing corn and to buy hens

loans.name: Elisa

texts.en:
Elisa is 42 years old and has three children. She is married and has two children who are in school.

Elisa is in the agricultural business, farming vegetables in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 5,000 loan through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. (NWTF) to buy fertilizer and other farm supplies.

Elisa has been in this business for two years now and has borrowed one time in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Elisa would like to save enough money to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Jose Oldemar

texts.es: José Oldemar, tiene la edad  de 60 años, está divorciado, vive con sus hijos,  los cuales son su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra  semilla de frijol de buena calidad y que tenga una buena germinación y de fertilizantes orgánicos que le ayuden a mejorar las condiciones de materia orgánica del suelo y otros productos para aplicarle a la siembra y durante el desarrollo y cosecha, además pagar mano de obra en trabajos de preparación del terreno y de labores que le ayuden a que el agua de lluvia no cause daños por la erosión, y también para la aplicación de los productos y asistencia de la plantación una vez que tenga desarrollo, y de esta manera asegurarse de realizar un buen trabajo. Lo que pretende es aprovechar las buenas condiciones de clima y suelo que cuenta la zona para este cultivo, y también poner en práctica la experiencia de varios años en el manejo de granos básicos. Además de poder comprar los mejores productos y de mejor calidad para que su plantación tenga un buen desarrollo y sanidad al igual que una cosecha adecuada, y tener a corto plazo una producción importante. Con el ingreso de la cosecha que espera obtener quiere utilizarla en el bienestar y estudio de su familia y cumplir con algunas metas familiares y seguir invirtiendo más en los cultivos. Es el primer  préstamo que  ha recibido de FUDECOSUR. Él no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
José Oldemar is 60 years old. He is divorced and lives with his children, who are his top priority. With his loan, he intends to make a purchase of high-quality bean seed so that he will have a good germination, organic fertilizers that will help him improve the condition of the organic material in the soil, and other products to apply during planting, growing and harvesting. In addition, he will pay for manual labor for soil preparation, work that will help him prevent the rain water from causing erosion damage, and also to apply the products and assist with the crop once it is growing. In this way, he will ensure that he does a good job.

His intention is to take advantage of the good climate and soil conditions that the region has for this crop, and also to put into practice his several years of experience in managing staple crops. In addition, he will be able to buy the best and highest-quality products so that his crop will have good growth, health, and a proper yield, and to have significant production in the short term.

He wants to use the income from the harvest that he expects to obtain for the wellbeing and education of his family, to achieve some family goals, and to continue investing more in his crops. This is the first loan that he has received from FUDECOSUR. He had not gotten other loans before in the state banks, but FUDECOSUR has provided him with a loan that has better terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to plant beans

loans.name: Blanca Margarita

texts.es:
Blanca, de 50 años de edad, es una persona muy trabajadora y responsable, vive junto su esposo y su hijo de 17 años de edad, pero junto a su esposo procrearon tres hijos, pero los otros dos están en los EE.UU. 

Blanca, junto a su esposo han trabajado en la agricultura, porque es de ahí que han logrado sacar adelante a sus hijos con gran sacrificio. 

El crédito lo necesita para comprar semilla, abono, fertilizantes y herbicidas para volver a sembrar maíz, porque debido a la sequía perdieron la cosecha.

Blanca, sueña con poder viajar a los EE.UU. para conocer el país y poder ver a sus hijos nuevamente.
texts.en:
Blanca is 50 years old. She is a very hardworking and responsible person. She lives with her husband and their 15 year-old son. She and her husband have three children, but the other two are working in the United States.

Blanca and her husband have been working in agriculture because this is how they’ve provided for their children, through much sacrifice.

The loan is needed to buy seed, manure, fertilizers, and herbicides in order to replant corn because they lost their harvest due to the drought.

Blanca dreams of traveling to the United States so she can see that country and also see her children again.

loans.use: to buy seeds, manure, fertilizers and herbicides to replant her corn corn crop, which was lost  due to a drought.

loans.name: Milagro Del Carmen

texts.es:
Milagro, de 50 años de edad, tiene 1 hijo que vive en el extranjero.

Milagro, anteriormente tenía una tienda, pero luego ella se enfermó y no tuvo oportunidad de atender más la tienda, así que ahora está trabajando con aves de corral.

El dinero del crédito lo utilizara para armar un corral para aves, porque donde las tiene no es un lugar adecuado para pollos de engorde.

El sueño que tiene, es que a corto plazo puedan auementar la cantidad de aves en el corral.
texts.en:
50-year old Milagro has one child son who lives overseas.

Formerly Milagro ran a store but then she became ill and couldn't manage to keep the store running. Now she raises poultry.

Milagro plans to use the loan money to build a chicken coop as the current space is not suitable for fattening chickens. Her dream, in the short term, is to increase the quantity of chickens in the coop.

loans.use: build a chicken coop

loans.name: Chhunlek's Group

texts.en:
Originally from the Kampong Cham province, Chhun Lek is 55 years old and a mother of six children. Nowadays, she needs to support three children, two of whom are still in school. She can earn income to improve her family’s living condition via growing corn and catching fish. She can save her daily income of about 33,000 KHR per day. Her corn has been destroyed by insects, so she is getting a lower yield than before, which is the main challenge for her business.

This is her second cycle with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner), and she fully paid back her past loan successfully. With her previous loan, she was able to improve her family’s living to be better than before.

Now, she is leading a group of two to borrow a new loan via VisionFund again. As the group leader, she will manage her loan portion to buy diesel to run the machine for pumping water into her farm so that her crops will grow well. She hopes that her corn can gain her a higher yield than last year, with a decent income to upgrade her lifestyle.

loans.use: to buy diesel to run the machine for pumping water into her farm so that her crops will grow well.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Tbaung Khmum district

loans.name: Dúo Las Gemelas Group

texts.es:
Dúo las gemelas
Doña Marta tiene 21 años de edad, inicio su negocio hace 3 años los cuales le han servido
De experiencia para seguir adelante, ella inviertio su crédito en telas para hacer blusas
Típicas, ella agradece a dios y a Kiva por la oportunidad que le han brindado, su mayor anhelo es
Poder tener un local grande para ya no trabajar como vendedora ambúlate gracias por su comprensión y su apoyo
texts.en:
Las Gemelas duo

Marta is 21 years old. She began her business 3 years ago, which has served her with experience to get ahead. She invested her loan in fabrics to make traditional blouses. The is thankful to God and Kiva for the opportunity that they have offered her. Her greatest desire is to be able to have a big store to stop working as a street vendor. Thank you for your understanding and support.

loans.use: to purchase raw materials to make traditional woven goods to sell.

loans.name: Gladis Isabel

texts.es:
En el cantón El Carmen se reúnen cada 15 días las socias del Grupo de Crédito Granito de Esperanza, donde una de las fuentes principales de ingreso es el cultivo del plátano de la variedad Barraganete.
En este lugar vive la señora Gladis, está separada y tiene 4 hijos de 15, 12, 4 y 2 años los mismos que estudian en el colegio y escuela. Viven en casa propia.
Doña Gladis hace 15 años empezó un negocio, ella tiene una pequeña chiflería donde elaboran snachs de plátanos (cortan los verdes en rodajitas muy finas y fríen en abundante aceite caliente, luego se los saca y se los pone sal refinada) esto es una guarnición que acompañan a los ceviches y otros platos típicos. Trabaja sola de lunes a domingos de 4 a 5 horas diarias. Tiene su chiflería  por 15 años y siempre le ha ido muy bien ya que sus clientes la prefieren por la calidad del chifle (snacks). 
Este crédito es para comprar plátano verde, aceite y sal para su negocio. Es socia fundadora del Grupo De Crédito y le gusta por la ayuda que le brindan los créditos para salir adelante en su negocio y mejorar su situación económica. Su sueño es terminar sus estudios ya que desea entrar a la Universidad y algún día obtener el título de profesora.
texts.en:
Every 15 days, members of the Grupo de Crédito Granito de Esperanza meet in the El Carmen district, where one of the main sources of income is the cultivation of plantains of the Barraganete variety.

In this place lives señora Gladis. She is separated and has four children, ages 15, 12, 4 and 2, who are in middle school and primary school. They live in their own house. 

15 years ago, Doña Gladis began a business. She has a small snack shop where plantain snacks are made (they cut the green ones into very fine circles and fry them in lots of hot oil, then take them out and put them in fine salt). This is a food that accompanies ceviche and other traditional plates.

She works by herself from Monday to Sunday, four to five hours a day. She has had her shop for 15 years and it has always gone very well for her since her clients prefer her for the quality of the snacks. 

This loan is to buy green plantain, oil and salt for her business. She is a founding member of the Grupo de Crédito, which she likes for the help that the loans provide her to succeed in her business and improve her financial situation. 

Her dream is to finish her studies since she wants to go to the university and one day become a professor.

loans.use: to buy green plantain, oil and salt.

loans.name: Yajaira Sugey

texts.es:
YAJAIRA TIENE 33 AÑOS CONVIVIENTE, CON CARGA FAMILIAR,VIVE EN CASA FAMILIAR. VIVE EN EL DISTRITO DE CAYALTI UBICADO A 42 KMS DE LA PROVINCIA DE CHICLAYO, REGION LAMBAYEQUE, COSTA NORTE DE PERU. HABITADA POR GENTE AMABLE DEDICADA A LA AGRICULTURA, GANADERIA Y COMERCIO.

YAJAIRA SE DEDICA A LA VENTA DE ALIMENTOS PREPARADOS DESDE HACE VARIOS AÑOS,ASI COMO DE BEBIDAS GASEOSAS, GALLETAS, AGUA MINERAL, ENTRE OTROS. NECESITA PRESTAMO PARA INVERTIR EN COMPRA DE MERCADERIA, PARA DARLE MAS VARIEDAD DE PRODUCTOS A SU NEGOCIO, EL CUAL REPERCUTIRA EN UN MAYOR INGRESO A SU UNIDAD FAMILIAR Y POR ENDE MEJORAR SU CALIDAD DE VIDA.
texts.en:
Yajaira is 33 years old, partnered with family responsibilities, and lives in the family house. She lives in Cayalti district, located 42 kilometers from Chiclayo province, Lambayeque region, on the northern coast of Peru, which is inhabited by friendly people who work in agriculture, raising animals and trade.

Yajaira has worked selling prepared food for a number of years, such as soft drinks, cookies, mineral water, and more. She needs the loan to invest in the purchase of merchandise to give her business more variety of products, which will have an impact of more income for her family, with the end of improving her quality of life.

loans.use: to invest in purchasing merchandise.

loans.name: Arlinda

texts.en:
Arlinda is a married woman with six children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. She is 45 years old, and two of her children are in school.

Arlinda has a vegetable farming business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 5,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy fertilizer and other farm supplies.

Arlinda has been in this business for ten years. In the future, she would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Miriam Rosa

texts.es:
Miriam tiene 65 años y vive en el municipio de Tolú Viejo, en la costa Atlántica colombiana. Tiene un negocio de cría de ganado hace 10 años, lo que le ha permitido dar a su familia lo necesario para vivir. A su avanzada edad aun cuenta con vitalidad para seguir trabajando para brindar una buena calidad de vida a su familia.

Miriam hoy llega con el fin de obtener un préstamo que le permita comprar cerdos para su crianza y posterior venta, además de inventario. Confía en que esto le ayudará a mejorar sus ventas e ingresos para que su negocio crezca progresivamente.

Esta mujer que tanto ha sacrificado sueña con poder arreglar su cada que se encuentra muy deteriorada. Ayuda a Miriam con préstamo y demuéstrale que tantos años de sacrificio y trabajo obtienen resultados.
texts.en:
Maria is 65 years old and lives in the municipality of Tolú Viejo, on the Colombian Atlantic coast. She has had a business of raising animals for 10 years, which has allowed her to give her family the necessities to live. At her advanced age, she still has the vitality to continue working to offer a good quality of life to her family.

Miriam aims to obtain a loan that will allow her to buy pigs to raise and later sell, in addition to supplies. She is confident that this will help her to improve her sales and income so that her business can grow progressively.

This woman who has sacrificed so much dreams of being able to repair her house, which is very deteriorated. Help Miriam with a loan and show her that so many years of sacrifice and work obtain results.

loans.use: to buy pigs to raise and sell, in addition to supplies.

loans.name: Maria Luisa

texts.es:
María vive con su hija, es soltera, no cuenta con familiares en el extranjero que le ayuden económicamente, es propietaria de un comedor y una pupusería, su familia trabaja en el mismo negocio, tiene un horario de siete de la mañana a siete de la noche, y realiza esta actividad desde hace 25 años.
Con la finalidad de tener mayores ingresos y atender mejor a sus clientes solicita un crédito para comprar verduras, quesillo, bebidas, condimentos, maíz, arroz, etc., tendrá materia prima para elaborar la venta de comida y pupusas, espera seguir contando con la preferencia de sus clientes y generar mejores ingresos para resarcir su deuda.
Su sueño es tener un comedor de prestigio y brindar un buen servicio a sus clientes.
texts.en:
María lives with her daughter, is single, doesn't have any relatives abroad who help her economically, is the owner of a restaurant and a pupusa-making business, her family works in the same business, she works from seven in the morning to seven at night, and she has done this work for 25 years.

With the end of having more income and serving her customers better, she asks for a loan to purchase vegetables, quesillo, drinks, seasonings, corn, rice, etc. She will have the raw material to make and sell the food and pupusas. She hopes to continuing having her customers' preference and to generate more income to pay off her debt.

Her dream is to have a prestigious restaurant and offer good customer service.

loans.use: to purchase vegetables, quesillo, drinks, seasonings, corn, rice, etc.; she will have the raw material to make and sell food and pupusas.

loans.name: Aracely

texts.es:
Aracely,  a sus 41 años de edad, es soltera. 

Con el fin de adquirir ingresos por cuenta propia desea iniciar su propio negocio y aprovechar los conocimientos que tienen en gastronomía. 

Montará un restaurante, idea que surgió de la necesidad de satisfacer los gustos y necesidades de las personas que transitan por la zona donde reside; para lograrlo requieren el apoyo del préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de activos fijos (nevera, horno, asador, instalar la cocina, ollas, cubiertos, vajilla, y otros utensilios de cocina), realizar adecuaciones en el local y comprar surtido al por mayor (verduras, carne, pastas, gaseosas) de esta forma podrá dar inicio a su proyecto de negocio con el ideal de conseguir clientes que hagan de su negocio un sitio reconocido por la calidad tanto de los alimentos,  como del servicio que ofrecerán. 

Aracely es consciente que para sacar su proyecto adelante debe trabajar con dedicación, disciplina y esmero, sólo así logrará hacer de su idea una empresa rentable que le genere buenos ingresos y le garantice una estabilidad económica para brindar a su familia un mejor bienestar y calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Aracely is 41 years old and single. 

With the purpose of earning income through self-employment she wishes to start her own business and take advantage of her culinary knowledge. 

She will set up a restaurant, an idea the came from the need to satisfy the tastes and needs of the people who pass through her neighbourhood.  In order to achieve this she requires the help of a loan in order to invest in a kitchen (fridge, oven, grill, kitchen installation, pots, cutlery and other kitchen utensils), carry out a refurbishment of the premises and to buy wholesale stock (vegetables, meat, pasta, soft drinks).  

This way she will be able to start her business venture with the hope that she will attract clients and earn her business a reputation for quality as much as the food and the service it will offer.  
   
Aracely is conscious that in order to make the project a success she will have to be dedicated, disciplined and conscientious in her work. It is only by doing this that she will achieve her ambition of a profitable business that will generate a good income and guarantee the economic stability to provide well-being and a better quality of life for her family.

loans.use: to invest in a kitchen (fridge, oven, grill, kitchen installation, pots, cutlery and other kitchen utensils), carry out a refurbishment of the premises and to buy wholesale stock.

loans.name: Delsy Rudis

texts.es:
Delsy, estudio hasta bachillerato, es madre soltera, tiene 3 hijos que asisten a la escuela.

Delsy, es una mujer con muchos deseos de superación, trabaja desde la edad de 18 años, su primer empleo fue de ama de casa, en el cual trabajo durante 8 años.- También ha trabajado como cocinera en un comedor, pero ahora tiene un negocio de venta de frutas, verduras y cócteles de conchas. 

El crédito será utilizado para comprar más frutas, verduras y conchas para vender. 

El sueño de Delsy, es mejorar su vivienda, crecer en su negocio y de esta forma brindarles una mejor calidad de vida para sus hijos.
texts.en:
Delsy has a high-school education. She is a single mother and has three children who attend school.

Delsy is a woman with a strong desire to better herself. She has worked since the age of 18. Her first job was as a housekeeper, a job she has worked in for 8 years. She has also worked as a cook in a cafeteria, but now she has a business selling fruit, vegetables, and clam cocktails.

The loan will be used to buy more fruits, vegetables, and clams to sell.

Delsy's dream is to improve her house, grow her business, and by doing so, provide her children with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy more fruits, vegetables, and clams to sell.

loans.name: Jhon Abelardo

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal MUJERES EMPRENDEDORAS, él socio continua  sus actividades diarias trabajando para una empresa pública, el socio es arquitecto de profesión, el socio es una persona responsable y empeñoso, siendo de esta manera que el socio saca adelante a su familia.
EL socio solicito el crédito para la realizar el mantenimiento de su computadora.
El socio se siente agradecido por el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
The borrower belongs to the Mujeres Emprendedoras communal bank. The borrower continues with his daily activities working for a public business, the borrower is an architect by profession. The borrower is a responsible and determined person, and in this way, the borrower gets his family ahead.

The borrower asks for the loan to do maintenance on his computer.

The borrower is grateful for the loan and promises to make the payments on the established schedule.

loans.use: to pay for maintenance on his computer.

loans.name: Yessenia

texts.es:
La socia Yessenia pertenece al banco comunal “Mujeres Emprendedoras” de la ciudad del Cusco - Perú, la socia sigue con su negocio de venta de ropa ,la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día  a su negocio, la socia continua vendiendo a sus amistades ,familiares, clientes entre otros, siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante  a su familia.
 La socia agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
La socia solicito el crédito para la compra de casacas  entre otros.
texts.en:
The borrower Yessenia belongs to the Mujeres Emprendedoras communal bank in the city of Cusco, Peru. The borrower continues with her clothing sales business. She has had this business for a good while, which is going well for her thanks to the dedication that she puts into her business each day. The borrower continues selling to her friends, family, customers, and others, and it is in this way that the borrower gets her family ahead. 

The borrower is grateful for the loan and promises to make the payments on the established schedule.

The member asked for the loan to purchase jackets and more.

loans.use: to purchase jackets and more.

loans.name: Nida

texts.en:
Nida is a hard-working entrepreneur who has a fishing business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 7,000 through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. (NWTF) in order to buy fishing net and other equipment for her fishing business.

Nida successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

NWTF is re-listing Nida's business profile in support of her efforts to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy fishing net and other equipment.

loans.name: Luis Angel

texts.es: Luis Angel, tiene la edad  de 44 años, está en unión libre, vive con su esposa y su hija, los cuales son su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de equipo y herramientas para trabajar en construcción, la cual le facilitará la elaboración de los trabajos y así poder aumentar la cantidad de construcciones realizados y aprovechar el conocimiento adquirido en capacitaciones y en la práctica y así poder tener ingresos económicos para seguir invirtiendo en la compra de más equipo y herramientas y otras productos, y  también lograr un mejor acabado a las construcciones, además de aumentar la cantidad y calidad de los trabajos. Con esta compra pretende hacer diseños más variados y así cumplir con los pedidos a corto plazo. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Luis Angel is 44 years old, in a common-law marriage, and lives with his wife and daughter, who are his greatest priority. With the loan, he plans to purchase equipment and tools to work in construction, which will ease his work and, so, increase the amount of construction finished and take advantage of the knowledge acquired in training and in practice and to be able to have income to continue investing in the purchase of more equipment and tools and other products, and also to manage a better finish to his construction projects, in addition to increasing the quantity and quality of his work. With this purchase, he plans to make more varied designs and also meet the orders he has short-term. It is the first loan that he has gotten from FUDECOSUR. He has never had other loans in state banks before, but FUDECOSUR offers him a loan with better terms and much lower interest rates.

loans.use: to purchase construction tools.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal MUJERES EMPRENDEDORAS, él banco está ubicado en la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
El socio Juan alterna sus actividades diarias con su negocio de agencia de viajes, él socio es una persona responsable y empeñoso, él socio vende paquetes turísticos para sus clientes  como City Tours, Machupicchu, Valle Sagrado entre otros, él socio desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.

 El socio se siente agradecido por el  crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
El socio solicita el crédito para la compra de boletos entre otros.
texts.en:
The borrower belongs to the Mujeres Emprendedoras communal bank. The bank is located in Cusco province, Cusco department. 

The borrower, Juan, alternates his daily tasks with his travel agency business. The borrower is a responsible and determined person. The borrower sells tourist packages for his customers such as City Tours, Machu Picchu, Valle Sagrado and more. The borrower wants to be able to continue working so, in this way, to continue supporting his family.

The borrower is grateful for the granted loan and promises to make the established payments.

The borrower asks for the loan to purchase tickets and more.

loans.use: to purchase tickets and more.

loans.name: Mary Jane

texts.en: Mary Jane is a hardworking entrepreneur who runs a wood-lamination business in the Philippines. She has requested a loan for PHP 20,000 from NWTF to buy new tools and equipment for her company. Mary Jane successfully paid back a previous loan and will use her new loan to further build her business. NWTF is relisting Mary Jane's business profile again in support of her efforts to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy new tools and equipment for her wood lamination business

loans.name: Candy Vitalina

texts.es:
Candy, elabora empanadas para vender y además es costurera, es casada, tiene un hijo de 8 años de edad, se esposo tiene otra actividad económica, la venta de empanadas la desarrolla de lunes a viernes y los otros días se dedica a elaborar bolsos en su máquina de coser, de esta manera genera ingresos para ayudar en los gastos familiares.
El crédito que solicita le será de ayuda para comprar plátano, azúcar, leche y otros ingredientes para elaborar la venta de empanadas, espera aumentar la producción y generar mayores ganancias con las que respaldara el pago de su deuda.
Sus aspiraciones son compartir un estilo de vida más confortable con su familia.
texts.en:
Candy makes empanadas to sell and also is a seamstress. She is married, has an 8-year-old child, her husband has another business, she sells empanadas from Monday to Friday, and the other days she works making bags on her sewing machine. In this way she generates income to help with the family expenses.

The loan that she is getting will be a help to purchase plantains, sugar, milk, and other ingredients to make empanadas to sell, she hopes to increase her production and generate more income with which to pay off her debt. 

Her aspiration is to share a more comfortable lifestyle with her family.

loans.use: to purchase plantains, sugar, milk, and other ingredients to make and sell empanadas; she hopes to increase production.

loans.name: Sandra Yanira

texts.es:
Sandra, vive junto a su esposo de 35 años de edad y sus hijos de 10 y 7 años de edad, su actividad económica es administrar una tienda en la que ofrece variedad de productos de uso doméstico, personal, etc., también elabora venta de tortas, abre su negocio todos los días y lo estableció hace 17 años.
Con el capital comprara golosinas, bebidas, granos básicos, jabón, etc., le dará oportunidad de fortalecer más su negocio y atender a sus clientes como se lo merecen, espera recuperar la inversión con mejores ganancias y cubrir todos sus compromisos.
Los proyectos de Sandra son tener una venta de tortas más grande en la que pueda ofrecer otro tipo de menú.
texts.en:
Sandra lives with her 35-year-old husband and their children, ages 10 and 7. Her work is running a store that offers a variety of products, for home use, personal use, etc. She also makes and sells cakes. She opens her business every day and established it 17 years ago.

With the capital, she will purchase candies, drinks, basic grains, soap, etc.; it will give her the opportunity to strengthen her business more and serve her customers as they deserve. She hopes to recoup her investment with more earnings and cover all of her commitments.

The projects Sandra has are to have a larger cake sale business in which she can offer another type of menu.

loans.use: to purchase candies, drinks, basic grains, soap, etc.; it will give her the opportunity to strengthen her business more and serve her customers as they deserve.

loans.name: Gladys Aracely

texts.es: Gladys, tiene 36 años de edad, vive en union libre con su pareja, tiene dos hijos y reside en el municipio de Macuelizo, Santa Bárbara. Gladys tiene su propio negocio desde hace 6 años donde vende productos como arroz, azúcar, manteca, frijoles, harina, cereal, verdura,refrescos, churros, condimentos y otros. El préstamo que solicita es por 21,000 lempiras para surtir de productos como harina, manteca, refrescos, azucar,churros,pan, huevos, verduras, arroz, etc. para mantener suficiente inventario de productos y aumentar las ventas y clientes. Su plan es crecer como microempresaria y tener un negocio grande para obtener mejores ganancias para la familia.
texts.en:
Gladys is 36 years old. She lives with her partner and their two children and resides in the municipality of Macuelizo, Santa Barbara. Gladys has had her own business for six years where she sells products like rice, sugar, lard, beans, flour, cereal, vegetables, soft drinks, churros, condiments and others. 
The loan she requests is for 21,000 lempiras to stock products like flour, lard, soft drinks, sugar, churros, bread, eggs, vegetables, rice, etc., to maintain sufficient inventory of products and increase her sales and customers. Her plan is to grow her micro-business and to have a large business so that she can earn higher income for her family.

loans.use: to buy flour, lard, soft drinks, sugar, churros, bread, eggs, vegetables, rice, etc., to sell.

loans.name: Jorge Arturo

texts.es: Jorge Artura, un hombre emprendedor, tiene 57 años de edad, es casado y vive con su esposa y dos hijos actualmente, él quiere comprarse una vaca para cría con el fin de vender los terneros y de esta manera obtener ganancias económicas y si fuera el caso él también se dejaría las crías hembras para después producir más ganado, y de esta manera aumentar el número de ganado a su poder, por lo que él hace una solicitud de crédito, y es el primer préstamo que ha recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no registra otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Jorge Artura is an entrepreneurial man who is 57 years old and married. He lives with his wife and two kids currently. 

He wants to purchase a cow to breed with the purpose of selling the calves, and in this way he will make economic gains. He may also leave the female calves until later to produce more cattle, and in this way augment the number of cattle and its economic power.

This is why he is asking for a loan and it is his first loan that he has received form FUDECOSUR. He doesn't have a record of other loans with state-owned banks, but FUDECOSUR has offered him the loan with greater ease and a lower interest rate.

loans.use: to purchase a cow.

loans.name: Simonita

texts.en: Simonita owns a small sari-sari store in Panglao, Bohol. She is married and has three children ages 20, 13 and 12 years old. Her husband is a farmer and also knows how to fish and build houses. Simonita has run a sari-sari (or variety) store for the last ten years. She and her husband work hard to provide for and raise their family, and she is requesting a new loan to buy more items to sell including chips, biscuits, candies, spices, cooking oil, sugar, noodles, canned goods, powdered milk and chocolate drinks, soft drinks and liquor. In the future, Simonita dreams of expanding her business to improve her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy items to sell in her store.

loans.name: Grupo Puente Roto Iglesia Group

texts.es:
Miguel es un gran hombre es casado, con 46 años de edad, él es casado y tiene la linda familia de cinco hijas de las edades entre 15 y 30 años, ellos viven en una comunidad de San Antonio Suchitepéquez. 
Miguel (el primero del lado izquierdo de la foto) es un hombre que trasmite su entusiasmo por la vida y de las ganas de superarse, es por ello que es el líder del grupo Puente Roto Iglesia; el para brindarle a su querida familia lo necesario trabaja como pastor de una iglesia desde hace tres años, con su ejemplo y dedicación a cooperado con su comunidad en mejorar la seguridad, pero Miguel tiene la fortuna de contar con el apoyo de su esposa que se dedica  a la compra y venta de ropa típica.
Miguel desde hace algún tiempo se ha visto a la necesidad de remodelar el techo de su casa, que ya se encuentra en muy malas condiciones, a raíz de esta necesidad él solicita un préstamo para comprar láminas  de cinco metros y clavos para que su casa cuente con un techo más seguro.
El gran sueño de Miguel es construir una mejor casa donde puedan vivir mejor.
texts.en:
Miguel is a great man, he is married, 46 years old, married and has a lovely family of five daughters between the ages of 15 and 30. They live in a community of San Antonio Suchitepéquez. 

Miguel (the first on the left in the photo) is a man who shows his enthusiasm for life and his desire to improve himself. For this, he is the leader of the Puente Roto Iglesia group. To offer his beloved family what it needs, he has worked as a pastor in a church for the past three years, with his job and dedication, he has worked with his community in improving security, but Miguel has the fortune of having the support of his wife who works buying and selling traditional clothing. 

For some time, Miguel has seen the need to remodel the roof on his house, which is in very bad condition. So, due to this, he asks for a loan to purchase 5-meter metal sheeting and nails so that his house has a more secure roof.

Miguel's big dream is to build a better house where they can live better.

loans.use: to purchase metal sheeting and nails.

loans.name: Jorge

texts.es: Jorge, un hombre emprendedor , tiene 41 años de edad, es soltero y vive con su papá actualmente, él solicita un préstamo con la intención de asistir una siembra de jengibre que tiene , además con esto mejorara su cosecha y obtendrá mejores ganancias por el producto, en este momento él no cuenta con dinero para asistir su cultivo por esta razón solicita un préstamo en la fundación  ya que de esta actividad económica dependen para poder salir adelante,  es el primer préstamo que ha recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no registra otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Jorge is an enterprising 41 year old man. He is single and lives with his father currently. He is requesting a loan with the intention of attending to planting his ginger crop, improve his harvest, and get better returns for the product. At this time he does not have the money to attend to his cultivation, so he is asking for a loan from the foundation since he depends on this economic activity to succeed.

This is his first loan he received from FUDECOSUR. He has no other loans in state banks, but FUDECOSUR has provided a loan with ease and a much lower rate of interest.

loans.use: to attend to his ginger crop.

loans.name: Jean

texts.en: Jean is 29 years old and the mother of two children, one of whom is in school. She works very hard to provide for her family by running a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 7,000 loan from NWTF to buy more items to sell, including condiments, beverages, home care products, and other groceries. Jean has been in this line of work for the last year. In the future, she would like to save enough money to provide a secure future to her family.

loans.use: to buy more items to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy t-shirts, jeans, shirts, pants and others.

loans.name: Kuña Katupyry Group

texts.es:
El grupo se llama Kuña Katupyry, está dentro del programa de eliminación de la pobreza, cada una poniendo su mejor esfuerzo para poder luchar e ir mejorando poco a poco su calidad de vida.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Sara, ella tiene una huerta en una zona rural y comercializa por medio de una feria todas las semanas en el centro de la ciudad, los productos que ella cultiva, comenta que le está yendo muy bien y que ya tiene una muy buena clientela que siempre compra de ella sus excelentes productos.
La Sra. Sara pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de semillas y fertilizantes para acrecentar su producción de hortalizas y obtener mayor ingreso para el mejoramiento de la calidad de vida de toda su familia. 
En la foto del grupo aparecen 17 mujeres ya que el grupo tiene 17 miembros, pero en este ciclo solo 16 de ellas pide este préstamo.
texts.en:
This group is called Kuña Katupyry, and is part of the poverty elimination program. Each member gives her best effort to strive and slowly improve her quality of life. 

One of the members is Sara. She has a garden in a rural area and every week she sells what she's grown at a market in the city's downtown district. She says that she is doing very well and already has a good clientele that always buys her excellent produce. 

Sara is requesting this loan to invest it in the purchase of seeds and fertilizers to increase her vegetable production and obtain more income to improve the quality of life of her whole family. 

The group photo shows 17 women because the group is made up of 17 members, but in this loan cycle, only 16 of them are requesting this loan.

loans.use: To buy seeds and fertilizers.

loans.name: Rozario

texts.es: La Sra. Rozario, comenzó con las ventas de chupetes gelatinas y refresco en su domicilio hace dos años. Actualmente gracias a su esfuerzo y trabajo la Sra Rozario tiene su negocio de venta de gaseosas, refrescos y comidas típicas de la Selva, ubicado en un lugar más céntrico en la cual tiene mayores consumidores . Con los ingresos de sus ventas apoya a su hija con los gastos de documentos de Titulación de sus estudios. El crédito adquirido lo invertirá en la compra de gaseosas e insumos para la preparación de sus comidas. Una de sus metas de Rozario es tener su propio negocio ya que el local donde trabaja es alquilado. Está muy contenta de recibir el apoyo de los inversionistas Kiva.
texts.en: Sra. Rozario started selling soft drinks and snacks from her house two years ago.  Thanks to her hard work and perseverance, she now has an established food and beverage sales business.  She sells soft drinks and prepared foods that are traditional to the Rainforests of Peru.  She operates the business from a space in the center of town and her earnings from the business support her daughter's university studies.  Sra. Rozario is applying for a loan that she will use to buy soft drinks and supplies for carrying on her business.  One of her goals is to have her own business, as she is currently operating out of a rented premises. She is grateful to Kiva lenders for their support.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks and supplies for her food & beverage sales business.

loans.name: Jerlinda

texts.en: Jerlinda is grateful that the Center for Community Transformation (CCT) helps her with her business. Monetary support, lectures and seminars are part of our program, which is molding her continuously to be well equipped as an entrepreneur. Thanks to a prior loan of PHP 50,000, she was able to buy items to sell in her variety store and computer shop. She’s been in this line of work for a year now and would very much like to expand her business. She is requesting a loan for PHP 50,000 to buy more items to sell and repair old computers. Jerlinda consistently attends her weekly fellowship group for CCT partners and gains spiritual strength, pays microfinance loans and studies religion.

loans.use: to buy more items to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Javier Ernesto

texts.es:
Javier, de 24 años de edad, estudio hasta sexto grado, está acompañado y es padre de un niño de 2 años de edad, viven en la casa de los padres de su esposa.

Javier, se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 8 años, pues sus padres se dedicaban al mismo oficio y le enseñaron muy bien a cultivar la tierra, también trabaja en una empresa dedicada a reparaciones y mantenimiento de carreteras, tiene que viajar hasta otro departamento 2 horas y media de viaje desde su casa al lugar de trabajo.

Javier, invertirá el crédito para comprar abono, herbicida y plaguicidas, los cuales utilizara en la aplicación de los cultivos de maíz y frijol, teniendo estos productos en su casa el podrá aplicarlos en el tiempo justo y así asegurar una buena producción de granos básicos.

El sueño de Javier, es un futuro obtener un crédito más grande para construir su propia vivienda.
texts.en:
Javier is 24 years old and went to school until sixth grade. He is the married father of a two-year-old son. They live in his wife's parents' house.

Javier has been working in agriculture for eight years, as his parents had the same profession and taught him very well how to cultivate the land. He also works in a business that repairs and maintains roads. He has to travel to another department 2.5 hours from his house to get to his workplace.

Javier will invest the loan in the purchase of fertilizer, herbicide and pesticides, which he will use on his corn and bean crops. With these items on-hand in his house, he will be able to apply them at just the right time and thus assure a good production of basic grains.

Javier's dream is to get a bigger loan in the future to construct his own home.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, herbicide and pesticides.

loans.name: Lolita

texts.en:
Lolita is 49 years old and married with five children. With one child in school, Lolita works very hard to provide for them. She runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 5,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like candies, personal care products, junk foods, and other groceries.

Lolita has been in this business for three years. In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like candies, personal care products, junk foods, and other groceries.

loans.name: Ana Laura

texts.en:
Ana Laura is a 26-year-old woman who lives with her boyfriend and has a young daughter.
She makes a living working at a market store; she also runs two food stands in the street with her mother.

She is asking for a $20,000 (20,000 pesos) loan, which she would use to fix her van and buy new wheels.

She handled previous loans before and she always paid on time.

loans.use: to repair her van and buy new wheels.

loans.name: Trinath Group

texts.en:
In the year 2011, nine self-dependent women of Ghantsuni village,Titlagarh of Bolangir district, Odisha, India formed a group named Trinath. All the group members are from poor families. Their main objective is to expand their existing business and development of their social livelihood by taking a loan from Mahashakti Foundation. It will be their fourth loan cycle.

Pushpanjali is the most active and energetic lady of the concerned village and has taken the leadership of the group. The incredible lady is aged about 38 years and standing as the third person from the righthand side with a raised hand in the photo. She is a cheerful lady with high ambition. Her family consists of her husband and only one son.

For the last 5 years, Pushpanjali has engaged in a betel shop with some cosmetic items and has been selling with the help and support of her husband. She earns a monthly income of INR 6, 500 from their occupation. But the present income is not sufficient to manage the business expenses as well as the household expenses for her family.

So she decided to raise her income by increasing the volume of her business through a loan. She will purchase betel, mouth fresheners, biscuits, cookies, snacks, soap, washing powder, shampoo, deodorant, etc., to fulfill the demands of customers. Pushpanjali hopes that will definitely generate a handsome extra income. She has a dream to save enough to reconstruct her thatched house and to construct a pucca house.

The other eight members of the group are also engaged in different small businesses like poultry, an egg business, vegetable vending, a breakfast centre, a tea stall, a grocery shop, a cosmetic & fancy shop, etc.

loans.use: to purchase betel, mouth fresheners, bread, biscuits, cookies, snacks, soap, washing powder, shampoo, deodorant, etc.

loans.name: Zuleyma Guadalupe

texts.es: Zuleyma tiene 26 años y vive en Tepic, Nayarit. Es soltera y tiene una carrera técnica industrial. Es una mujer muy tenaz y audaz, es una mujer preocupada por los demás y sobre todo por su comunidad. Una de sus grandes pasiones es el campo y todo lo que tenga que ver con la agricultura, lleva más de 4 años trabajando en el aspecto agrícola, ella vende productos agrícolas, apoya a los productores del campo, hace proyectos para el campo y apoyo a la mujer. Con su negocio ella quiere posicionarse como uno de los mejores negocios agrícolas de Nayarit, abrir una oficina en el centro y tener su propia bodega. La mayor satisfacción de su negocio no es económica, sino ver a las personas con los apoyos y la alegría que tienen de que se les apoye. Ella está solicitando un préstamo por MXN 10,000 para poder publicitarse y hacer propaganda para su negocio. Esta muy orgullosa del empeño que le pone a su negocio para salir adelante y lo perseverante que es. Al colaborar con Zuleyma no solo la estarás apoyando a ella, también estarás apoyando a cientos de campesinos que dependen de la actividad de ella.
texts.en:
Zuleyma is 26 years old and lives in Tepic, Nayarit. She is single and has an industrial tech degree. She is a very tenacious and brave woman, she is a woman concerned about others and, above all, for her community. One of her great passions is the countryside and everything that has to do with agriculture. She has been working for over 4 years related to agriculture. She sells agricultural products, supports the rural producers, does projects for the countryside and in support of women. 

With her business, she wants to establish herself as one of the best agricultural businesses in Nayarit, open an office in the center and have her own shop. The greatest satisfaction from her business is not economic, but rather seeing people with the supports and the joy they have that they are supported. She is asking for a loan of MXN 10,000 to be able to advertise her business. She is very proud of the determination that she puts into her business to get ahead and how persistent she is. When working with Zuleyma, you not only will be supporting her, but you will be supporting hundreds of rural people who depend on her business.

loans.use: to do advertising for her business.

loans.name: Carolina Del Carmen

texts.es:
Carolina  de 39 años de edad  casada con  tres hijos menores, es originaria de Managua, se caracteriza por ser trabajadora, responsable, con ganas de superación personal.  Lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos no pudo seguir estudiando y se dedicó a trabajar para apoyar con los gastos del hogar. En la actualidad lucha día a día para sacar adelante su negocio, y cumplir sus sueños  y metas como formar a sus hijos en profesionales dos de sus hijos  están en la universidad y terminar su casa, y hacer crecer su negocio.
Gracias a que ha vencidos todos su miedos y ha persistido su perseverancia ha crecido poco a poco en el negocio, el negocio consisten en vender ropa de segunda mano pero de buena calidad. El negocio lo tiene ubicado en su casa de habitación y en unos del mercado de la zona.  Tiene cuatro años de dedicarse a dicho negocio. La rutina de trabajo de esta joven Sra. Es de unas diez horas diarias ofreciendo sus productos. El objetivo del crédito es invertir en capital de trabajo y surtir su negocio en la compra y venta de paca de ropa usada de buena calidad. Para que en un futuro no muy lejano pueda obtener mejores ingresos. Carolina agradece la ayuda que los inversionistas kiva les brindan a personas de escasos recursos y países pobre como es Nicaragua para tener un medio de trabajo digno.
texts.en:
Carolina is 39 years old and is married with three young children. She is from Managua and is hardworking, responsible, and motivated to improve herself. Unfortunately, due to a lack of resources she could not continue studying and worked to help with the expenses of the home. Currently, she struggles day by day for her business to get ahead, to accomplish her dreams and goals such as helping her children to become professionals and go to university, as well as to finish her home and to grow her business.    
Thanks to having overcome her fears and having continued in her perseverance, her business has grown little by little. The business consists of selling second hand clothing that is in good condition. Her business is located in her home and in one of the markets in the area. She started the business four years ago. 
Carolina's work routine is that she offers her products 10 hours each day. The objective of the credit is to invest in work capital and stock her business in buying and selling a package of used, good quality clothing, so that in the not too distant future she will be able to obtain a better income. Carolina is grateful for the help of the Kiva investors who loan to people of limited resources and poor countries, such as Nicaragua so that they can have dignified work.

loans.use: to buy a package of used clothing such as shorts, dresses, shirts, etc.

loans.name: Musharaf

texts.ru: Мушараф замужняя женщина из городка Истаравшан. Ей 37 лет. Мушараф воспитывает троих детей. Она занимается животноводством. Мушараф имеет 8 летний стаж работы в этой сфере деятельности. Ее день начинается раннего утра с работы на скотном дворе. Мушараф хочет расширить деятельность и купить пару голов скотин. Для этой операции она просит кредит. На заемные деньги купит несколько телят и увеличит доход, что позволит семье новые экономические возможности.
texts.en:
Musharaf is a married woman from the small city of Istaravshan. She is 37 years old and raising three children. She is involved in animal husbandry and has eight years of experience in this field. Her working day in the barnyard starts early in the morning.

Musharaf wants to expand her activity and buy a few head of livestock. For this reason, she is taking a loan. She will use her money to buy a few calves and increase her income, which will offer new economic opportunities to her family.

loans.use: to buy a few calves.

loans.name: Virgencita Chanka Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “VIRGENCITA CHANKA”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Challabamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Paucartambo y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Vilma Germania ella es casada y tiene 51 años y tiene 3 hijos; La socia trabaja en su negocio de venta de cereales, la socia vende maíz, trigo y quinua,la socia es una mujer muy trabajadora que por medio de su pequeño trabajo quiere sacar adelante a su familia, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de venta de cereales. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar trigo, maíz y quinua.
Los socios que estan pegados a la foto grupal se les tomo la foto despues de la reunion porque pidieron permiso por motivos de trabajo.
	
Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de animales, negocio de venta de cereales, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de venta de comida.



La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
These are partners of the community bank Virgencita Chanka (Little Chanka Virgin).  This bank is located in the Challabamba District, belonging to the province of Paucartambo, in the Cusco Region.

Partner Mrs. Vilma Germania is married, 51 years old, and has 3 children.  She works in her business of selling cereals, including corn, wheat and quinoa.  She is a very hardworking woman, who through her small enterprise wishes to support her family.  She works from 8 AM to 5 PM; her dream is to expand her grain selling business.  She is requesting a loan to buy wheat, corn and quinoa.

The partners whose photos are superimposed on the group photo had their photos taken after the group meeting because they requested leave for work reasons.

The other partners are in the businesses of selling animals, selling cereals, running a grocery store, and selling food.

The partners are grateful to those who, through Asociación Arariwa and Kiva, are supporting their dreams, and agree to comply with paying the amounts due by their deadline.

loans.use: to buy wheat, corn and quinoa.

loans.name: Jose Luis

texts.es:
José, es una persona dedicada a trabajar en el campo, cultiva granos básicos como maíz y frijol, cuenta con más de 40 años dedicarse a dicha actividad, además repara calzado, de está manera cubre sus necesidades, José tiene 61 años de edad, es viudo, vive solo y no tiene familiares en el extranjero.
El préstamo lo invertirá en semilla de maíz y frijol, así como también insecticidas, fertilizantes y abono para poder sembrar en el tiempo justo, será de ayuda para aumentar la producción de  granos, tendrá alimento por una larga temporada y venderá otra parte para generar ingresos con los comprara medicamentos y ropa. Los riesgos del  negocio son los cambios climáticos que pueden provocar que no tenga una buena producción.
Sus sueños son mejorar su negocio, incrementar sus ingresos y tener un estilo de vida más digno.
texts.en:
José is dedicated to his work in the fields. He cultivates basic grains like corn and beans, and has dedicated more than 40 years to said work. In addition, he repairs shoes and in this way covers his necessities. 

José is 61 years old, is a widower, and lives alone with no relatives abroad. 

He will invest the loan in corn and bean seeds, as well as insecticides, fertilizers and compost in order to plant at the right time. The loan will help him augment the production of grains, and he will have food for the long term. He will sell the rest to generate income and with this he will buy medication and clothes. 

The risks of his business are the climate change which can cause him to not have a good production.

His dreams are to improve his business, and increase his income to have a more dignified style of life.

loans.use: invest in corn and bean seeds as well as insecticides, fertilizers, and compost in order to plant at the right time.

loans.name: Antonio Luis

texts.es: Antonio de 54 años, cuenta con una amplia experiencia en servicio de mantenimiento y reparación de herramientas eléctricas como Taladros y Pulidoras, durante años laboró con distintas empresas prestadoras de estos servicios, permitiéndole conocer a profundidad el negocio y llevándolo a tomar una decisión muy importante para su futuro al independizarse y conformar su propia microempresa.  En la actualidad cuenta con clientes fidelizados a quienes ofrece sus servicios todos los días a partir de las 7 a.m. hasta las 7 p.m. y como su meta es tener su propio local, él es muy consiente que solo podrá hacerlo posible si continua trabajando con mucho espemero y compromiso. Antonio está aplicando a su primer credikiva por intermedio de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, para comprar repuestos como bobinas, acoples, alambre y demás.  Con esta inversión Antonio tendrá a la mano los materiales necesarios para ofrecer un servicio oportuno y de calidad.  Su meta familiar es adquirir su casa propia y ofrecer bienestar a su familia.
texts.en:
Antonio is 54 years old, he has extensive experience servicing and maintaining electrical tools such as drills and polishing machines.  For years he worked for several companies providing these services, allowing him to gain a deep understanding of the business. This led him to make an important decision about his future; to become independent and set up his own small business. 

Currently he counts on loyal customers, offering his services daily from 7 am to 7 pm. His goal is to own his own premises, and he understands that he will only be able to achieve this through continued commitment and hard work.

Antonio is applying for his first Kiva loan through  the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, to buy to buy spare parts including coils, connectors, wire and so forth. With this investment Antonio will have all the necessary materials available. This will allow him to offer timely and quality service . His family goal is to buy his own home and provide for the well being of his family.

loans.use: to buy spare parts including coils, connectors, wire and so forth

loans.name: Otoniel Jose

texts.es:
En el año 2005 inicio su sueño como independiente el señor José, un hombre que en la actualidad tiene 63 años de edad, vive con su pareja y sus 4 hijos.

Anteriormente se desempeñaba como mayordomo y realizaba trabajo varios para sostener su hogar, pero conforme iba pasando el tiempo se iba cansando de obtener siempre los mismo resultados y es por ello que quiso superarse personalmente para darles a sus familiares un excelente futuro y monto un negocio de cría de animales y agricultura la cual hace en un pequeño terreno que tiene en s hogar.

Su principal objetivo es crear un negocio sostenible en el tiempo para dejarle el legado a sus hijos.

Para fortalecer su negocio, seguir con su crecimiento y llevar su empresa a un siguiente nivel de competitividad en el terreno, José, desea solicitar un préstamo para la compra  de cerdos, compra de ganado, alimento y vitaminas para sus animales.
texts.en:
In 2005, José began his dream as an independent worker. He is a 63 year old man who lives with his partner and 4 children. Previously, he served as a butler and did various jobs to support his home, but as time passed he was tired of always getting the same results. For that reason, he wanted to personally exceed to give his family an excellent future, so he set up a business breeding animals and in agriculture, which he does on a small piece of land that he has in his home. 

His main goal is to create a sustainable business in time to leave it as a legacy to his children. To strengthen his business, continue with growth and to take his business to the next competitive level in the field, José wants to ask for a loan to buy pigs, cattle, and food and vitamins for his animals.

loans.use: to buy pigs, cattle and food and vitamins for his animals.

loans.name: Sinan's Group

texts.en:
Sinan, 37, lives with family members in a rural village of the Battambang province. She is a mother of three children, two of whom are in school and the other one is too young to attend school. For her living, she grows rice and sells desserts as the main source of income. Moreover, her husband is working as a soldier to get additional income to complement their family’s needs.

Because of drought, her rice did not grow well, which is the main challenge for her. She has been involved in her rice farm for 13 years, and she can save from her daily income about 23,400 KHR per day. This is ninth cycle for Sinan with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She wisely paid back her past loans, which upgraded her condition to better than before.

Due to lack of working capital, she is now leading a group of seven to apply for a new loan. As the group leader, she will use her entire loan portion to buy rice seed, fertilizer and pay for plowing fees to improve her farming business and gain more yields. She hopes that her rice farm can gain her higher yields than last year.

loans.use: to buy rice seed, fertilizer and pay for plowing fees to improve her farming business and gain more yields.

loans.name: Jagadamba Group

texts.en:
Jagadamba group was formed in the year 2015 at Tentulikhunti village of Bolangir district, Odisha, India. There are 11 active self-dependent women, with the objective of developing their existing businesses as well as their livelihoods. All the group members are from poor families. All the members of the concerned group have their own professions and businesses.

Manorama is one of them who taken a great role in her own development and the group members' source of revenue improvement. She is standing as the third person from the righthand side with a raised hand in the photo. She is about 34 years old and living with her husband and two children.

Her family has been engaged with a grocery shop at Tentulikhunti village for the last six years. All family members are promoting their business. But through the concerned business, the monthly income of the family is about 6,600 INR.

In Manorama’s opinion this income is not at all sufficient to maintain her family and hence there are almost zero surpluses at the end of the month. She planned to improve her business with more investment but the availability of funds is the main concern.

As a result, Manorama applied for a loan for her group and got approved by Mahashakti. From this loan she will purchase rice, wheat, oil, sugar, tea, soap, washing powder, deodorant, etc. She hopes to get more and more profit from her business expansion and save money for reconstruction of her house.

The other 10 members of her group are also smart at their professions and also actively engaged with different businesses like a betel shop, a cosmetic and fancy shop, poultry, a grocery shop, a hotel, etc., and, with this loan, hope to heighten their livelihoods.

loans.use: to purchase rice, wheat, oil, sugar, tea, soap, washing powder, deodorant, etc.

loans.name: Bhagabati Group

texts.en:
In the year 2015, eleven self-dependent women of Malisira village of Bolangir district, Odisha, India formed a group named Bhagabati. All the group members are from poor families. The main objective is to expand their existing businesses and develop their social livelihoods by taking a loan from Mahashakti Foundation.

Rina is the most active lady of the concerned village and has taken the leadership to form a self help group. The lady is aged about 30 years and is standing as the second person from righthand side with a raised hand in the photo. She is a cheerful lady with high ambition. Her family consists of her husband and three children.

For the last 10 years, Rina has engaged in the grocery business with the help and support of her husband. It shows that Rina is very active and wants the overall improvement of her family. The monthly income of her family is about INR 6,800.

But the present income is not sufficient to manage the business expenses as well as the household expenses for her family. So she decided to expand her business through Loan. She will purchase all grocery items like rice, wheat, oil, sugar, tea, soap, washing powder, deodorant etc. Rina hopes that this will definitely generate a handsome extra income. She has a dream to save enough for the better education of her children and construction of a pucca house.

The other ten members of the group are also engaged with different small businesses like a grocery shop, animal trading, vegetable vending, seasonal items, and stone cutting.

loans.use: to purchase all grocery items like rice, wheat, oil, sugar, tea, soap, washing powder, deodorant, etc.

loans.name: Braulio Luis

texts.es:
El socio Braulio pertenece al banco comunal “Cusco Sur” de la ciudad del Cusco – Perú. 
El socio continua dedicándose a trabajar para una institución del estado, el socio es una persona responsable, el socio lleva buen tiempo en su trabajo el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día  a su negocio, a la vez sigue dedicándose a la compra y venta de artesania,el socio desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando  a su familia.
El socio agradece el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos. 
El socio solicita el crédito para la compra de artesanías entre otros.
El socio está muy agradecido con KIVA por permitirle mantenerse y crecer en su actividad y por apoyarlo con su familia.
texts.en:
Braulio is a member of the communal bank "Cusco Sur" in the city of Cusco, Perú. 
He continues to work at a State Institution. He is very responsible and he does well in his job because of the determination with which he approaches everyday. 
He will continue buying and selling handicrafts. He wants to be able to continue this work in order to continue supporting his family. He is grateful for the loan and promises to make the payments according to the set times. 
He is requesting the loan to buy handicrafts, among other things. He is very grateful to Kiva for allowing him to maintain and increase this activity and for supporting him with his family.

loans.use: to buy handicrafts among other things.

loans.name: Isidro

texts.es: Isidro, tiene la edad  de 62 años, está casado, vive con su esposa,  la cual es su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra  semilla de frijol de buena calidad y que tenga una buena germinación y de fertilizantes orgánicos que le ayuden a mejorar las condiciones de materia orgánica del suelo y otros productos para aplicarle a la siembra y durante el desarrollo y cosecha, además pagar mano de obra en trabajos de preparación del terreno y de labores que le ayuden a que el agua de lluvia no cause daños por la erosión, y también para la aplicación de los productos y asistencia de la plantación una vez que tenga desarrollo, y de esta manera asegurarse de realizar un buen trabajo. Lo que pretende es aprovechar las buenas condiciones de clima y suelo que cuenta la zona para este cultivo, y también poner en práctica la experiencia de varios años en el manejo de granos básicos. Además de poder comprar los mejores productos y de mejor calidad para que su plantación tenga un buen desarrollo y sanidad al igual que una cosecha adecuada, y tener a corto plazo una producción importante. Con el ingreso de la cosecha que espera obtener quiere utilizarla en el bienestar y estudio de su familia y cumplir con algunas metas familiares y seguir invirtiendo más en los cultivos. Es el primer  préstamo que  ha recibido de FUDECOSUR. Él no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Isidro is 62 years old. He is married and lives with his wife, who is his main priority. With this loan, he wants to buy bean seed of good quality and good germination, and organic fertilizers that will help him improve the organic material conditions of the soil and other products to apply to the crops during their development and harvest. Also, he will pay for hand labor in jobs of soil preparation and work that help so the rainwater does not cause damage through erosion. It will also be for applying products and assisting the plantation once it has developed, so he makes sure to accomplish a good job. What he wants is to take advantage of the good climate and soil conditions of the area for this cultivation, and also to put in practice his many years of experience managing basic grains. Also, he wants to buy better quality products so that his plantation develops well and is healthy, as well as assuring an adequate harvest and an important production in short term. He hopes to use the income he will obtain from the harvest in the well being and education of his family, and to fulfill some family goals and continue investing in his crops. It is the first loan he has received from FUDECOSUR. He had not had other loans from state banks before, but  FUDECOSUR has given him the loan with better terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to help in his bean crops.

loans.name: Claveles Ii Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “CLAVELES II” iniciará el primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Alto Lima, está compuesta por ocho  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Josefina es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de zapatos, costura de polleras, venta de chompas, venta de salteñas, venta de pollos al espiedo, tienda de pulpería, venta de comida, venta de cosméticos, venta de mantas. 

El crédito que sacaran beneficiará a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Josefina es integrante, ella indica que ingreso a Pro Mujer por la invitación de una amiga que es cliente de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de zapatos; da a conocer que este negocio lo aprendió cuando le ayudaba a su tía y desde hace veinte años que ella decidió emprender este negocio. 

El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de zapatos por mayor) que adquirirá de las vendedoras mayoristas de la ciudad de La paz  y posteriormente lo comercializará en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia económicamente, ya que ella es casada y tiene tres hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta la capacitación y el área de salud que ofrece la institución.

En la foto no aparece la señora Justina porque después del desembolso se tuvo que ir a su puesto de venta.
texts.en:
The group 'CLAVELES II' will get started in the first cycle of Pro Mujer, as part of the Central Focus on Alto Lima. The group is made up of eight members, and is run by a board of directors, Josefina is the President. 

The group members run a variety of businesses, including: selling shoes, making traditional skirts, selling jumpers, selling salteñas (Bolivian pastry), selling BBQ chickens, grocery store, food stall, cosmetic sales and selling blankets.

The loan will benefit micro-businesses such as the one that Josefina runs. Josefina joined Pro Mujer after being invited by a friend who was already working with the institution. 

Josefina has a business selling shoes. She learnt the business helping her Aunt and decided to start her own business 20 years ago. The loan will allow Josefina to increase her capital and thus buy shoes wholesale. She will buy the shoes from wholesale sellers in the city of La Paz and then sell them for retail prices in her commercial space.  

This type of work allows Josefina to make money to support her family, she is married with three children. When asked what Josefina likes about Pro Mujer, she replied that she enjoys the training and the health centre that the institution offers. 

Josefina is not in the photo because when the photo was taken she had left to go to work.

loans.use: to buy shoes wholesale

loans.name: Clavelitos Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “CLAVELITOS” iniciará el segundo ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Villa Adela, está compuesta por ocho  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Fidelia es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de chompas, venta de sombreros de lana, venta de mantas, venta de ropa, venta de cerveza, venta de cortinas, venta de mantas de vicuña y alpaca.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Fidelia es integrante, ella indica que ingreso a  Pro Mujer por la invitación de una amiga que es cliente de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de ropa; da a conocer que este negocio lo aprendió de su mamá hace ocho años.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de ropa por mayor) que adquirirá de las vendedoras mayoristas ciudad de La Paz y Desaguadero y posteriormente lo comercializará en la feria. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia económicamente, ya que ella vive es soltera y tiene un hijo.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta la capacitación ofrece la institución.
texts.en:
The “CLAVELITOS” communal bank is starting their second cycle with Pro Mujer, as part of the Villa Adela regional branch. It is made up of eight members and lead by a board of directors with Fidelia as President. The businesses of the members are varied amongst them are: the sale of sweaters, selling wool hats, selling blankets, clothing sales, the sale of beer, selling curtains and selling alpaca and vicuña wool blankets.

The loan will benefit all these micro entrepreneurs, one of them being Fidelia. She says that she joined Pro Mujer on the invitation of a friend who is a member of the institution. She currently has a business selling clothing and she explained that she learned the business from her mother eight years ago.

The loan she is getting now is to increase her capital (buying clothing wholesale) which she will acquire at the wholesalers of the city of La Paz and Desaguadero which she will later sell in the market.
